name: Jailbreak (itch) (Squabix)
description:
Jailbreak is a short and colorful game where you escape a prison right under the noses of its guards. Whether you’re befriending a strategic prisoner or crawling through a disgusting sewer, you’re going to escape, no matter what. Or will you?

Explore Over Five Interactive Rooms

Discover Secrets

Solve Puzzles

And Escape Prison
